SELECT S.NO ,S.WRITER_NO ,S.TITLE ,S.CONTENT ,S.ENROLL_DATE ,S.MODIFY_DATE ,S.DEL_YN ,S.CHECK_DATE ,M.CODE FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.WRITER_NO = M.NO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND TITLE LIKE '%${value}%'
AND CONTENT LIKE '%${value}%'
ORDER BY S.NO
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND NO = #{no}
